emf_sr_has_any_religion_char_flag = {
	OR = {
		has_flag = character_was_catholic
		has_flag = character_was_cathar
		has_flag = character_was_fraticelli

		has_flag = character_was_mazdaki

		has_flag = character_was_taoist
	}

emf_sr_is_in_PREVs_interesting_society = {
	trigger_if = {
		limit = { society_member_of = secret_religious_society_catholic }
		PREV = { interested_in_society = secret_religious_society_catholic }

emf_sr_has_any_char_old_religion = {
	OR = {
		AND = {
			has_flag = character_was_catholic
			any_character = { religion = catholic emf_isolated_character = no }
		}
		AND = {
			has_flag = character_was_cathar
			any_character = { religion = cathar emf_isolated_character = no }
		}
		AND = {
			has_flag = character_was_fraticelli
			any_character = { religion = fraticelli emf_isolated_character = no }
		}
		AND = {
			has_flag = character_was_waldensian
			any_character = { religion = waldensian emf_isolated_character = no }
		}
		AND = {
			has_flag = character_was_lollard
			any_character = { religion = lollard emf_isolated_character = no }
		}
		AND = {
			has_flag = character_was_adoptionist
			any_character = { religion = adoptionist emf_isolated_character = no }
		}
		AND = {
			has_flag = character_was_arian
			any_character = { religion = arian emf_isolated_character = no }
		}
		AND = {
			has_flag = character_was_orthodox
			any_character = { religion = orthodox emf_isolated_character = no }
		}
		AND = {
			has_flag = character_was_bogomilist
			any_character = { religion = bogomilist emf_isolated_character = no }
		}
		AND = {
			has_flag = character_was_monothelite
			any_character = { religion = monothelite emf_isolated_character = no }
		}
		AND = {
			has_flag = character_was_iconoclast
			any_character = { religion = iconoclast emf_isolated_character = no }
		}
		AND = {
			has_flag = character_was_syriac
			any_character = { religion = syriac emf_isolated_character = no }
		}
		AND = {
			has_flag = character_was_maronite
			any_character = { religion = maronite emf_isolated_character = no }
		}
		AND = {
			has_flag = character_was_miaphysite
			any_character = { religion = miaphysite emf_isolated_character = no }
		}
		AND = {
			has_flag = character_was_monophysite
			any_character = { religion = monophysite emf_isolated_character = no }
		}
		AND = {
			has_flag = character_was_apostolic
			any_character = { religion = apostolic emf_isolated_character = no }
		}
		AND = {
			has_flag = character_was_paulician
			any_character = { religion = paulician emf_isolated_character = no }
		}
		AND = {
			has_flag = character_was_tondrakian
			any_character = { religion = tondrakian emf_isolated_character = no }
		}
		AND = {
			has_flag = character_was_nestorian
			any_character = { religion = nestorian emf_isolated_character = no }
		}
		AND = {
			has_flag = character_was_messalian
			any_character = { religion = messalian emf_isolated_character = no }
		}
		AND = {
			has_flag = character_was_sunni
			any_character = { religion = sunni emf_isolated_character = no }
		}

		}
		AND = {
			has_flag = character_was_qarmatian
			any_character = { religion = qarmatian emf_isolated_character = no }
		}
		AND = {
			has_flag = character_was_norse_pagan_reformed
			any_character = { religion = norse_pagan_reformed emf_isolated_character = no }
		}
		AND = {
			has_flag = character_was_norse_pagan
			any_character = { religion = norse_pagan emf_isolated_character = no }
		}
		AND = {
			has_flag = character_was_tengri_pagan_reformed
			any_character = { religion = tengri_pagan_reformed emf_isolated_character = no }
		}
		AND = {
			has_flag = character_was_tengri_pagan
			any_character = { religion = tengri_pagan emf_isolated_character = no }
		}
		AND = {
			has_flag = character_was_baltic_pagan_reformed
			any_character = { religion = baltic_pagan_reformed emf_isolated_character = no }
		}
		AND = {
			has_flag = character_was_baltic_pagan
			any_character = { religion = baltic_pagan emf_isolated_character = no }
		}
		AND = {
			has_flag = character_was_finnish_pagan_reformed
			any_character = { religion = finnish_pagan_reformed emf_isolated_character = no }
		}
		AND = {
			has_flag = character_was_finnish_pagan
			any_character = { religion = finnish_pagan emf_isolated_character = no }
		}
		AND = {
			has_flag = character_was_aztec_reformed
			any_character = { religion = aztec_reformed emf_isolated_character = no }
		}
		AND = {
			has_flag = character_was_aztec
			any_character = { religion = aztec emf_isolated_character = no }
		}
		AND = {
			has_flag = character_was_slavic_pagan_reformed
			any_character = { religion = slavic_pagan_reformed emf_isolated_character = no }
		}
		AND = {
			has_flag = character_was_slavic_pagan
			any_character = { religion = slavic_pagan emf_isolated_character = no }
		}
		AND = {
			has_flag = character_was_west_african_pagan_reformed
			any_character = { religion = west_african_pagan_reformed emf_isolated_character = no }
		}
		AND = {
			has_flag = character_was_west_african_pagan
			any_character = { religion = west_african_pagan emf_isolated_character = no }
		}
		AND = {
			has_flag = character_was_zun_pagan_reformed
			any_character = { religion = zun_pagan_reformed emf_isolated_character = no }
		}
		AND = {
			has_flag = character_was_zun_pagan
			any_character = { religion = zun_pagan emf_isolated_character = no }
		}
		AND = {
			has_flag = character_was_hellenic_pagan_reformed
			any_character = { religion = hellenic_pagan_reformed emf_isolated_character = no }
		}
		AND = {
			has_flag = character_was_hellenic_pagan
			any_character = { religion = hellenic_pagan emf_isolated_character = no }
		}
		AND = {
			has_flag = character_was_bon_reformed
			any_character = { religion = bon_reformed emf_isolated_character = no }
		}
		AND = {
			has_flag = character_was_bon
			any_character = { religion = bon emf_isolated_character = no }
		}
		AND = {
			has_flag = character_was_zoroastrian
			any_character = { religion = zoroastrian emf_isolated_character = no }
		}
		AND = {
			has_flag = character_was_mazdaki
			any_character = { religion = mazdaki emf_isolated_character = no }
		}
		AND = {
			has_flag = character_was_zurvanist
			any_character = { religion = zurvanist emf_isolated_character = no }
		}
		AND = {
			has_flag = character_was_manichean
			any_character = { religion = manichean emf_isolated_character = no }
		}
		AND = {
			has_flag = character_was_mandaean
			any_character = { religion = mandaean emf_isolated_character = no }
		}
		AND = {
			has_flag = character_was_yazidi
			any_character = { religion = yazidi emf_isolated_character = no }
		}
		AND = {
			has_flag = character_was_khurmazta
			any_character = { religion = khurmazta emf_isolated_character = no }
		}
		AND = {
			has_flag = character_was_jewish
			any_character = { religion = jewish emf_isolated_character = no }
		}
		AND = {
			has_flag = character_was_samaritan
			any_character = { religion = samaritan emf_isolated_character = no }
		}
		AND = {
			has_flag = character_was_karaite
			any_character = { religion = karaite emf_isolated_character = no }
		}
		AND = {
			has_flag = character_was_hindu
			any_character = { religion = hindu emf_isolated_character = no }
		}
		AND = {
			has_flag = character_was_buddhist
			any_character = { religion = buddhist emf_isolated_character = no }
		}
		AND = {
			has_flag = character_was_jain
			any_character = { religion = jain emf_isolated_character = no }
		}
		AND = {
			has_flag = character_was_taoist
			any_character = { religion = taoist emf_isolated_character = no }
		}
	}
}

# THIS = province, ROOT is in a society which correspond to a secret religious community in THIS
emf_sr_has_secret_community_of_ROOT = {
	trigger_if = {
		limit = { ROOT = { society_member_of = secret_religious_society_catholic } }
		has_province_modifier = secret_catholic_community
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { ROOT = { society_member_of = secret_religious_society_cathar } }
		has_province_modifier = secret_cathar_community
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { ROOT = { society_member_of = secret_religious_society_fraticelli } }
		has_province_modifier = secret_fraticelli_community
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { ROOT = { society_member_of = secret_religious_society_waldensian } }
		has_province_modifier = secret_waldensian_community
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { ROOT = { society_member_of = secret_religious_society_lollard } }
		has_province_modifier = secret_lollard_community
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { ROOT = { society_member_of = secret_religious_society_adoptionist } }
		has_province_modifier = secret_adoptionist_community
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { ROOT = { society_member_of = secret_religious_society_arian } }
		has_province_modifier = secret_arian_community
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { ROOT = { society_member_of = secret_religious_society_orthodox } }
		has_province_modifier = secret_orthodox_community
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { ROOT = { society_member_of = secret_religious_society_bogomilist } }
		has_province_modifier = secret_bogomilist_community
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { ROOT = { society_member_of = secret_religious_society_monothelite } }
		has_province_modifier = secret_monothelite_community
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { ROOT = { society_member_of = secret_religious_society_iconoclast } }
		has_province_modifier = secret_iconoclast_community
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { ROOT = { society_member_of = secret_religious_society_syriac } }
		has_province_modifier = secret_syriac_community
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { ROOT = { society_member_of = secret_religious_society_maronite } }
		has_province_modifier = secret_maronite_community
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { ROOT = { society_member_of = secret_religious_society_miaphysite } }
		has_province_modifier = secret_miaphysite_community
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { ROOT = { society_member_of = secret_religious_society_monophysite } }
		has_province_modifier = secret_monophysite_community
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { ROOT = { society_member_of = secret_religious_society_apostolic } }
		has_province_modifier = secret_apostolic_community
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { ROOT = { society_member_of = secret_religious_society_paulician } }
		has_province_modifier = secret_paulician_community
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { ROOT = { society_member_of = secret_religious_society_tondrakian } }
		has_province_modifier = secret_tondrakian_community
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { ROOT = { society_member_of = secret_religious_society_nestorian } }
		has_province_modifier = secret_nestorian_community
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { ROOT = { society_member_of = secret_religious_society_messalian } }
		has_province_modifier = secret_messalian_community
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { ROOT = { society_member_of = secret_religious_society_sunni } }
		has_province_modifier = secret_sunni_community
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { ROOT = { society_member_of = secret_religious_society_zikri } }
		has_province_modifier = secret_zikri_community
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { ROOT = { society_member_of = secret_religious_society_mahdiyya } }
		has_province_modifier = secret_mahdiyya_community
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { ROOT = { society_member_of = secret_religious_society_nabawiyya } }
		has_province_modifier = secret_nabawiyya_community
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { ROOT = { society_member_of = secret_religious_society_ibadi } }
		has_province_modifier = secret_ibadi_community
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { ROOT = { society_member_of = secret_religious_society_kharijite } }
		has_province_modifier = secret_kharijite_community
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { ROOT = { society_member_of = secret_religious_society_haruri } }
		has_province_modifier = secret_haruri_community
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { ROOT = { society_member_of = secret_religious_society_shiite } }
		has_province_modifier = secret_shiite_community
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { ROOT = { society_member_of = secret_religious_society_waqifi } }
		has_province_modifier = secret_waqifi_community
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { ROOT = { society_member_of = secret_religious_society_zaydi } }
		has_province_modifier = secret_zaydi_community
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { ROOT = { society_member_of = secret_religious_society_hurufi } }
		has_province_modifier = secret_hurufi_community
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { ROOT = { society_member_of = secret_religious_society_ismaili } }
		has_province_modifier = secret_ismaili_community
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { ROOT = { society_member_of = secret_religious_society_druze } }
		has_province_modifier = secret_druze_community
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { ROOT = { society_member_of = secret_religious_society_qarmatian } }
		has_province_modifier = secret_qarmatian_community
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { ROOT = { society_member_of = secret_religious_society_norse_pagan_reformed } }
		has_province_modifier = secret_norse_pagan_reformed_community
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { ROOT = { society_member_of = secret_religious_society_norse_pagan } }
		has_province_modifier = secret_norse_pagan_community
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { ROOT = { society_member_of = secret_religious_society_tengri_pagan_reformed } }
		has_province_modifier = secret_tengri_pagan_reformed_community
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { ROOT = { society_member_of = secret_religious_society_tengri_pagan } }
		has_province_modifier = secret_tengri_pagan_community
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { ROOT = { society_member_of = secret_religious_society_baltic_pagan_reformed } }
		has_province_modifier = secret_baltic_pagan_reformed_community
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { ROOT = { society_member_of = secret_religious_society_baltic_pagan } }
		has_province_modifier = secret_baltic_pagan_community
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { ROOT = { society_member_of = secret_religious_society_finnish_pagan_reformed } }
		has_province_modifier = secret_finnish_pagan_reformed_community
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { ROOT = { society_member_of = secret_religious_society_finnish_pagan } }
		has_province_modifier = secret_finnish_pagan_community
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { ROOT = { society_member_of = secret_religious_society_aztec_reformed } }
		has_province_modifier = secret_aztec_reformed_community
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { ROOT = { society_member_of = secret_religious_society_aztec } }
		has_province_modifier = secret_aztec_community
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { ROOT = { society_member_of = secret_religious_society_slavic_pagan_reformed } }
		has_province_modifier = secret_slavic_pagan_reformed_community
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { ROOT = { society_member_of = secret_religious_society_slavic_pagan } }
		has_province_modifier = secret_slavic_pagan_community
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { ROOT = { society_member_of = secret_religious_society_west_african_pagan_reformed } }
		has_province_modifier = secret_west_african_pagan_reformed_community
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { ROOT = { society_member_of = secret_religious_society_west_african_pagan } }
		has_province_modifier = secret_west_african_pagan_community
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { ROOT = { society_member_of = secret_religious_society_zun_pagan_reformed } }
		has_province_modifier = secret_zun_pagan_reformed_community
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { ROOT = { society_member_of = secret_religious_society_zun_pagan } }
		has_province_modifier = secret_zun_pagan_community
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { ROOT = { society_member_of = secret_religious_society_hellenic_pagan_reformed } }
		has_province_modifier = secret_hellenic_pagan_reformed_community
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { ROOT = { society_member_of = secret_religious_society_hellenic_pagan } }
		has_province_modifier = secret_hellenic_pagan_community
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { ROOT = { society_member_of = secret_religious_society_bon_reformed } }
		has_province_modifier = secret_bon_reformed_community
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { ROOT = { society_member_of = secret_religious_society_bon } }
		has_province_modifier = secret_bon_community
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { ROOT = { society_member_of = secret_religious_society_zoroastrian } }
		has_province_modifier = secret_zoroastrian_community
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { ROOT = { society_member_of = secret_religious_society_mazdaki } }
		has_province_modifier = secret_mazdaki_community
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { ROOT = { society_member_of = secret_religious_society_zurvanist } }
		has_province_modifier = secret_zurvanist_community
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { ROOT = { society_member_of = secret_religious_society_manichean } }
		has_province_modifier = secret_manichean_community
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { ROOT = { society_member_of = secret_religious_society_mandaean } }
		has_province_modifier = secret_mandaean_community
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { ROOT = { society_member_of = secret_religious_society_yazidi } }
		has_province_modifier = secret_yazidi_community
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { ROOT = { society_member_of = secret_religious_society_khurmazta } }
		has_province_modifier = secret_khurmazta_community
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { ROOT = { society_member_of = secret_religious_society_jewish } }
		has_province_modifier = secret_jewish_community
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { ROOT = { society_member_of = secret_religious_society_samaritan } }
		has_province_modifier = secret_samaritan_community
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { ROOT = { society_member_of = secret_religious_society_karaite } }
		has_province_modifier = secret_karaite_community
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { ROOT = { society_member_of = secret_religious_society_hindu } }
		has_province_modifier = secret_hindu_community
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { ROOT = { society_member_of = secret_religious_society_buddhist } }
		has_province_modifier = secret_buddhist_community
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { ROOT = { society_member_of = secret_religious_society_jain } }
		has_province_modifier = secret_jain_community
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { ROOT = { society_member_of = secret_religious_society_taoist } }
		has_province_modifier = secret_taoist_community
	}
}

# THIS = county title, FROM's secret religious society is used
emf_sr_can_have_new_secret_community_of_FROM = {
	trigger_if = {
		limit = { FROM = { society_member_of = secret_religious_society_catholic } }
		location = {
			NOR = {
				religion = catholic
				has_province_modifier = secret_catholic_community
			}
		}
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { FROM = { society_member_of = secret_religious_society_cathar } }
		location = {
			NOR = {
				religion = cathar
				has_province_modifier = secret_cathar_community
			}
		}
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { FROM = { society_member_of = secret_religious_society_fraticelli } }
		location = {
			NOR = {
				religion = fraticelli
				has_province_modifier = secret_fraticelli_community
			}
		}
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { FROM = { society_member_of = secret_religious_society_waldensian } }
		location = {
			NOR = {
				religion = waldensian
				has_province_modifier = secret_waldensian_community
			}
		}
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { FROM = { society_member_of = secret_religious_society_lollard } }
		location = {
			NOR = {
				religion = lollard
				has_province_modifier = secret_lollard_community
			}
		}
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { FROM = { society_member_of = secret_religious_society_adoptionist } }
		location = {
			NOR = {
				religion = adoptionist
				has_province_modifier = secret_adoptionist_community
			}
		}
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { FROM = { society_member_of = secret_religious_society_arian } }
		location = {
			NOR = {
				religion = arian
				has_province_modifier = secret_arian_community
			}
		}
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { FROM = { society_member_of = secret_religious_society_orthodox } }
		location = {
			NOR = {
				religion = orthodox
				has_province_modifier = secret_orthodox_community
			}
		}
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { FROM = { society_member_of = secret_religious_society_bogomilist } }
		location = {
			NOR = {
				religion = bogomilist
				has_province_modifier = secret_bogomilist_community
			}
		}
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { FROM = { society_member_of = secret_religious_society_monothelite } }
		location = {
			NOR = {
				religion = monothelite
				has_province_modifier = secret_monothelite_community
			}
		}
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { FROM = { society_member_of = secret_religious_society_iconoclast } }
		location = {
			NOR = {
				religion = iconoclast
				has_province_modifier = secret_iconoclast_community
			}
		}
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { FROM = { society_member_of = secret_religious_society_syriac } }
		location = {
			NOR = {
				religion = syriac
				has_province_modifier = secret_syriac_community
			}
		}
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { FROM = { society_member_of = secret_religious_society_maronite } }
		location = {
			NOR = {
				religion = maronite
				has_province_modifier = secret_maronite_community
			}
		}
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { FROM = { society_member_of = secret_religious_society_miaphysite } }
		location = {
			NOR = {
				religion = miaphysite
				has_province_modifier = secret_miaphysite_community
			}
		}
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { FROM = { society_member_of = secret_religious_society_monophysite } }
		location = {
			NOR = {
				religion = monophysite
				has_province_modifier = secret_monophysite_community
			}
		}
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { FROM = { society_member_of = secret_religious_society_apostolic } }
		location = {
			NOR = {
				religion = apostolic
				has_province_modifier = secret_apostolic_community
			}
		}
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { FROM = { society_member_of = secret_religious_society_paulician } }
		location = {
			NOR = {
				religion = paulician
				has_province_modifier = secret_paulician_community
			}
		}
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { FROM = { society_member_of = secret_religious_society_tondrakian } }
		location = {
			NOR = {
				religion = tondrakian
				has_province_modifier = secret_tondrakian_community
			}
		}
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { FROM = { society_member_of = secret_religious_society_nestorian } }
		location = {
			NOR = {
				religion = nestorian
				has_province_modifier = secret_nestorian_community
			}
		}
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { FROM = { society_member_of = secret_religious_society_messalian } }
		location = {
			NOR = {
				religion = messalian
				has_province_modifier = secret_messalian_community
			}
		}
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { FROM = { society_member_of = secret_religious_society_sunni } }
		location = {
			NOR = {
				religion = sunni
				has_province_modifier = secret_sunni_community
			}
		}
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { FROM = { society_member_of = secret_religious_society_zikri } }
		location = {
			NOR = {
				religion = zikri
				has_province_modifier = secret_zikri_community
			}
		}
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { FROM = { society_member_of = secret_religious_society_mahdiyya } }
		location = {
			NOR = {
				religion = mahdiyya
				has_province_modifier = secret_mahdiyya_community
			}
		}
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { FROM = { society_member_of = secret_religious_society_nabawiyya } }
		location = {
			NOR = {
				religion = nabawiyya
				has_province_modifier = secret_nabawiyya_community
			}
		}
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { FROM = { society_member_of = secret_religious_society_ibadi } }
		location = {
			NOR = {
				religion = ibadi
				has_province_modifier = secret_ibadi_community
			}
		}
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { FROM = { society_member_of = secret_religious_society_kharijite } }
		location = {
			NOR = {
				religion = kharijite
				has_province_modifier = secret_kharijite_community
			}
		}
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { FROM = { society_member_of = secret_religious_society_haruri } }
		location = {
			NOR = {
				religion = haruri
				has_province_modifier = secret_haruri_community
			}
		}
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { FROM = { society_member_of = secret_religious_society_shiite } }
		location = {
			NOR = {
				religion = shiite
				has_province_modifier = secret_shiite_community
			}
		}
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { FROM = { society_member_of = secret_religious_society_waqifi } }
		location = {
			NOR = {
				religion = waqifi
				has_province_modifier = secret_waqifi_community
			}
		}

	trigger_else_if = {

		location = {
			NOR = {
				religion = zaydi
				has_province_modifier = secret_zaydi_community
			}
		}

				has_province_modifier = secret_qarmatian_community
			}
		}

			}
		}

	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { FROM = { society_member_of = secret_religious_society_taoist } }
		location = {
			NOR = {
				religion = taoist
				has_province_modifier = secret_taoist_community
			}
		}
	}
}

# THIS = province, ROOT's secret_religion is considered
emf_sr_has_not_religion_or_community_of_ROOT_sr = {
	trigger_if = {
		limit = { ROOT = { secret_religion = catholic } }
		NOR = {
			religion = catholic
			has_province_modifier = secret_catholic_community
		}
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { ROOT = { secret_religion = cathar } }
		NOR = {
			religion = cathar
			has_province_modifier = secret_cathar_community
		}
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { ROOT = { secret_religion = fraticelli } }
		NOR = {
			religion = fraticelli
			has_province_modifier = secret_fraticelli_community
		}
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { ROOT = { secret_religion = waldensian } }
		NOR = {
			religion = waldensian
			has_province_modifier = secret_waldensian_community
		}
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { ROOT = { secret_religion = lollard } }
		NOR = {
			religion = lollard
			has_province_modifier = secret_lollard_community
		}
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { ROOT = { secret_religion = adoptionist } }
		NOR = {
			religion = adoptionist
			has_province_modifier = secret_adoptionist_community
		}
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { ROOT = { secret_religion = arian } }
		NOR = {
			religion = arian
			has_province_modifier = secret_arian_community
		}
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { ROOT = { secret_religion = orthodox } }
		NOR = {
			religion = orthodox
			has_province_modifier = secret_orthodox_community
		}
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { ROOT = { secret_religion = bogomilist } }
		NOR = {
			religion = bogomilist
			has_province_modifier = secret_bogomilist_community
		}
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { ROOT = { secret_religion = monothelite } }
		NOR = {
			religion = monothelite
			has_province_modifier = secret_monothelite_community
		}
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { ROOT = { secret_religion = iconoclast } }
		NOR = {
			religion = iconoclast
			has_province_modifier = secret_iconoclast_community
		}
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { ROOT = { secret_religion = syriac } }
		NOR = {
			religion = syriac
			has_province_modifier = secret_syriac_community
		}
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { ROOT = { secret_religion = maronite } }
		NOR = {
			religion = maronite
			has_province_modifier = secret_maronite_community

		limit = { ROOT = { secret_religion = hellenic_pagan_reformed } }
		NOR = {
			religion = hellenic_pagan_reformed
			has_province_modifier = secret_hellenic_pagan_reformed_community
		}
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { ROOT = { secret_religion = hellenic_pagan } }
		NOR = {
			religion = hellenic_pagan
			has_province_modifier = secret_hellenic_pagan_community
		}
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { ROOT = { secret_religion = bon_reformed } }
		NOR = {
			religion = bon_reformed
			has_province_modifier = secret_bon_reformed_community
		}
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { ROOT = { secret_religion = bon } }
		NOR = {
			religion = bon
			has_province_modifier = secret_bon_community
		}
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { ROOT = { secret_religion = zoroastrian } }
		NOR = {
			religion = zoroastrian
			has_province_modifier = secret_zoroastrian_community
		}
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { ROOT = { secret_religion = mazdaki } }
		NOR = {
			religion = mazdaki
			has_province_modifier = secret_mazdaki_community
		}
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { ROOT = { secret_religion = zurvanist } }
		NOR = {
			religion = zurvanist
			has_province_modifier = secret_zurvanist_community
		}
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { ROOT = { secret_religion = manichean } }
		NOR = {
			religion = manichean
			has_province_modifier = secret_manichean_community
		}
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { ROOT = { secret_religion = mandaean } }
		NOR = {
			religion = mandaean
			has_province_modifier = secret_mandaean_community
		}
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { ROOT = { secret_religion = yazidi } }
		NOR = {
			religion = yazidi
			has_province_modifier = secret_yazidi_community
		}
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { ROOT = { secret_religion = khurmazta } }
		NOR = {
			religion = khurmazta
			has_province_modifier = secret_khurmazta_community
		}
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { ROOT = { secret_religion = jewish } }
		NOR = {
			religion = jewish
			has_province_modifier = secret_jewish_community
		}
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { ROOT = { secret_religion = samaritan } }
		NOR = {
			religion = samaritan
			has_province_modifier = secret_samaritan_community
		}
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { ROOT = { secret_religion = karaite } }
		NOR = {
			religion = karaite
			has_province_modifier = secret_karaite_community
		}
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { ROOT = { secret_religion = hindu } }
		NOR = {
			religion = hindu
			has_province_modifier = secret_hindu_community
		}
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { ROOT = { secret_religion = buddhist } }
		NOR = {
			religion = buddhist
			has_province_modifier = secret_buddhist_community
		}
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { ROOT = { secret_religion = jain } }
		NOR = {
			religion = jain
			has_province_modifier = secret_jain_community
		}
	}
	trigger_else_if = {
		limit = { ROOT = { secret_religion = taoist } }
		NOR = {
			religion = taoist
			has_province_modifier = secret_taoist_community
		}
	}
}

emf_sr_event_desc_african_pagan_group = {
	OR = {
		religion = west_african_pagan_reformed
		religion = west_african_pagan
	}
}

emf_sr_event_desc_christian_group_1 = {
	OR = {
		religion = catholic
		religion = cathar
		religion = fraticelli
		religion = waldensian
		religion = lollard
		religion = nestorian
		religion = messalian
		religion = adoptionist
		religion = arian
		religion = maronite
		religion = syriac
	}
}

emf_sr_event_desc_christian_group_2 = {
	OR = {
		religion = orthodox
		religion = bogomilist
		religion = monothelite
		religion = iconoclast
		religion = paulician
		religion = miaphysite
		religion = monophysite
		religion = apostolic
		religion = tondrakian
	}
}

emf_sr_event_desc_muslim_group_1 = {
	OR = {
		religion = sunni
		religion = zikri
		religion = ibadi
		religion = kharijite
		religion = mahdiyya
		religion = nabawiyya
		religion = haruri
	}
}

emf_sr_event_desc_muslim_group_2 = {
	OR = {
		religion = shiite
		religion = druze
		religion = hurufi
		religion = waqifi
		religion = zaydi
		religion = ismaili
		religion = qarmatian
	}
}

# THIS = character
emf_sr_cult_requires_dlc_unlock = {
	OR = {
		society_member_of = secret_religious_society_sunni
		society_member_of = secret_religious_society_zikri
		society_member_of = secret_religious_society_mahdiyya
		society_member_of = secret_religious_society_nabawiyya
		society_member_of = secret_religious_society_ibadi
		society_member_of = secret_religious_society_kharijite
		society_member_of = secret_religious_society_haruri
		society_member_of = secret_religious_society_shiite
		society_member_of = secret_religious_society_waqifi
		society_member_of = secret_religious_society_zaydi
		society_member_of = secret_religious_society_hurufi
		society_member_of = secret_religious_society_ismaili
		society_member_of = secret_religious_society_druze
		society_member_of = secret_religious_society_qarmatian
		society_member_of = secret_religious_society_norse_pagan_reformed
		society_member_of = secret_religious_society_norse_pagan
		society_member_of = secret_religious_society_tengri_pagan_reformed
		society_member_of = secret_religious_society_tengri_pagan
		society_member_of = secret_religious_society_baltic_pagan_reformed
		society_member_of = secret_religious_society_baltic_pagan
		society_member_of = secret_religious_society_finnish_pagan_reformed
		society_member_of = secret_religious_society_finnish_pagan
		society_member_of = secret_religious_society_aztec_reformed
		society_member_of = secret_religious_society_aztec
		society_member_of = secret_religious_society_slavic_pagan_reformed
		society_member_of = secret_religious_society_slavic_pagan
		society_member_of = secret_religious_society_west_african_pagan_reformed
		society_member_of = secret_religious_society_west_african_pagan
		society_member_of = secret_religious_society_zun_pagan_reformed
		society_member_of = secret_religious_society_zun_pagan
		society_member_of = secret_religious_society_hellenic_pagan_reformed
		society_member_of = secret_religious_society_hellenic_pagan
		society_member_of = secret_religious_society_bon_reformed
		society_member_of = secret_religious_society_bon
		society_member_of = secret_religious_society_zoroastrian
		society_member_of = secret_religious_society_mazdaki
		society_member_of = secret_religious_society_zurvanist
		society_member_of = secret_religious_society_manichean
		society_member_of = secret_religious_society_mandaean
		society_member_of = secret_religious_society_yazidi
		society_member_of = secret_religious_society_khurmazta
		society_member_of = secret_religious_society_jewish
		society_member_of = secret_religious_society_samaritan
		society_member_of = secret_religious_society_karaite
		society_member_of = secret_religious_society_hindu
		society_member_of = secret_religious_society_buddhist
		society_member_of = secret_religious_society_jain
		society_member_of = secret_religious_society_taoist
	}
}

# THIS = character
emf_sr_does_HF_unlock_cult = {
	OR = {
		society_member_of = secret_religious_society_norse_pagan_reformed
		society_member_of = secret_religious_society_norse_pagan
		society_member_of = secret_religious_society_tengri_pagan_reformed
		society_member_of = secret_religious_society_tengri_pagan
		society_member_of = secret_religious_society_baltic_pagan_reformed
		society_member_of = secret_religious_society_baltic_pagan
		society_member_of = secret_religious_society_finnish_pagan_reformed
		society_member_of = secret_religious_society_finnish_pagan
		society_member_of = secret_religious_society_aztec_reformed
		society_member_of = secret_religious_society_aztec
		society_member_of = secret_religious_society_slavic_pagan_reformed
		society_member_of = secret_religious_society_slavic_pagan
		society_member_of = secret_religious_society_west_african_pagan_reformed
		society_member_of = secret_religious_society_west_african_pagan
		society_member_of = secret_religious_society_zun_pagan_reformed
		society_member_of = secret_religious_society_zun_pagan
		society_member_of = secret_religious_society_hellenic_pagan_reformed
		society_member_of = secret_religious_society_hellenic_pagan
		society_member_of = secret_religious_society_bon_reformed
		society_member_of = secret_religious_society_bon
	}
}

# THIS = character
emf_sr_does_RoI_unlock_cult = {
	OR = {
		society_member_of = secret_religious_society_hindu
		society_member_of = secret_religious_society_buddhist
		society_member_of = secret_religious_society_jain
		society_member_of = secret_religious_society_taoist
	}
}

# THIS = character
emf_sr_does_SoA_unlock_cult = {
	OR = {
		society_member_of = secret_religious_society_jewish
		society_member_of = secret_religious_society_samaritan
		society_member_of = secret_religious_society_karaite
	}
}

# THIS = character
emf_sr_does_SoI_unlock_cult = {
	OR = {
		society_member_of = secret_religious_society_sunni
		society_member_of = secret_religious_society_zikri
		society_member_of = secret_religious_society_mahdiyya

	OR = {
		society_member_of = secret_religious_society_zoroastrian
		society_member_of = secret_religious_society_mazdaki
		society_member_of = secret_religious_society_zurvanist
		society_member_of = secret_religious_society_manichean
		society_member_of = secret_religious_society_mandaean
		society_member_of = secret_religious_society_yazidi
		society_member_of = secret_religious_society_khurmazta
		society_member_of = secret_religious_society_norse_pagan_reformed
		society_member_of = secret_religious_society_norse_pagan
		society_member_of = secret_religious_society_tengri_pagan_reformed
		society_member_of = secret_religious_society_tengri_pagan
		society_member_of = secret_religious_society_baltic_pagan_reformed
		society_member_of = secret_religious_society_baltic_pagan
		society_member_of = secret_religious_society_finnish_pagan_reformed
		society_member_of = secret_religious_society_finnish_pagan
		society_member_of = secret_religious_society_aztec_reformed
		society_member_of = secret_religious_society_aztec
		society_member_of = secret_religious_society_slavic_pagan_reformed
		society_member_of = secret_religious_society_slavic_pagan
		society_member_of = secret_religious_society_west_african_pagan_reformed
		society_member_of = secret_religious_society_west_african_pagan
		society_member_of = secret_religious_society_zun_pagan_reformed

		society_member_of = secret_religious_society_bon_reformed
		society_member_of = secret_religious_society_bon
	}
}

# THIS = character
emf_sr_does_JD_unlock_cult = {
	OR = {
		society_member_of = secret_religious_society_taoist
		society_member_of = secret_religious_society_bon
		society_member_of = secret_religious_society_bon_reformed
	}
}

emf_sr_old_religion_is_liege_sr = {
	OR = {
		AND = {
			has_flag = character_was_catholic
			liege = { secret_religion = catholic }
		}
		AND = {
			has_flag = character_was_cathar
			liege = { secret_religion = cathar }
		}
		AND = {
			has_flag = character_was_fraticelli
			liege = { secret_religion = fraticelli }
		}
		AND = {
			has_flag = character_was_waldensian
			liege = { secret_religion = waldensian }
		}
		AND = {
			has_flag = character_was_lollard
			liege = { secret_religion = lollard }
		}
		AND = {
			has_flag = character_was_adoptionist
			liege = { secret_religion = adoptionist }
		}
		AND = {
			has_flag = character_was_arian
			liege = { secret_religion = arian }
		}
		AND = {
			has_flag = character_was_orthodox
			liege = { secret_religion = orthodox }
		}
		AND = {
			has_flag = character_was_bogomilist
			liege = { secret_religion = bogomilist }
		}
		AND = {
			has_flag = character_was_monothelite
			liege = { secret_religion = monothelite }
		}
		AND = {
			has_flag = character_was_iconoclast
			liege = { secret_religion = iconoclast }
		}
		AND = {
			has_flag = character_was_syriac
			liege = { secret_religion = syriac }
		}
		AND = {
			has_flag = character_was_maronite
			liege = { secret_religion = maronite }
		}
		AND = {
			has_flag = character_was_miaphysite
			liege = { secret_religion = miaphysite }
		}
		AND = {
			has_flag = character_was_monophysite
			liege = { secret_religion = monophysite }
		}
		AND = {
			has_flag = character_was_apostolic
			liege = { secret_religion = apostolic }
		}
		AND = {
			has_flag = character_was_paulician
			liege = { secret_religion = paulician }
		}
		AND = {
			has_flag = character_was_tondrakian
			liege = { secret_religion = tondrakian }
		}
		AND = {
			has_flag = character_was_nestorian
			liege = { secret_religion = nestorian }
		}
		AND = {
			has_flag = character_was_messalian
			liege = { secret_religion = messalian }
		}
		AND = {
			has_flag = character_was_sunni
			liege = { secret_religion = sunni }
		}
		AND = {
			has_flag = character_was_zikri
			liege = { secret_religion = zikri }
		}
		AND = {
			has_flag = character_was_mahdiyya
			liege = { secret_religion = mahdiyya }
		}
		AND = {
			has_flag = character_was_nabawiyya
			liege = { secret_religion = nabawiyya }
		}
		AND = {
			has_flag = character_was_ibadi
			liege = { secret_religion = ibadi }
		}
		AND = {
			has_flag = character_was_kharijite
			liege = { secret_religion = kharijite }
		}
		AND = {
			has_flag = character_was_haruri
			liege = { secret_religion = haruri }
		}
		AND = {
			has_flag = character_was_shiite
			liege = { secret_religion = shiite }
		}
		AND = {
			has_flag = character_was_waqifi
			liege = { secret_religion = waqifi }
		}
		AND = {
			has_flag = character_was_zaydi
			liege = { secret_religion = zaydi }
		}
		AND = {
			has_flag = character_was_hurufi
			liege = { secret_religion = hurufi }
		}
		AND = {
			has_flag = character_was_ismaili
			liege = { secret_religion = ismaili }
		}
		AND = {
			has_flag = character_was_druze
			liege = { secret_religion = druze }
		}
		AND = {
			has_flag = character_was_qarmatian
			liege = { secret_religion = qarmatian }
		}
		AND = {
			has_flag = character_was_norse_pagan_reformed
			liege = { secret_religion = norse_pagan_reformed }
		}
		AND = {
			has_flag = character_was_norse_pagan
			liege = { secret_religion = norse_pagan }
		}
		AND = {
			has_flag = character_was_tengri_pagan_reformed
			liege = { secret_religion = tengri_pagan_reformed }
		}
		AND = {
			has_flag = character_was_tengri_pagan
			liege = { secret_religion = tengri_pagan }
		}
		AND = {
			has_flag = character_was_baltic_pagan_reformed
			liege = { secret_religion = baltic_pagan_reformed }
		}
		AND = {
			has_flag = character_was_baltic_pagan
			liege = { secret_religion = baltic_pagan }
		}
		AND = {
			has_flag = character_was_finnish_pagan_reformed
			liege = { secret_religion = finnish_pagan_reformed }
		}
		AND = {
			has_flag = character_was_finnish_pagan
			liege = { secret_religion = finnish_pagan }
		}
		AND = {
			has_flag = character_was_aztec_reformed
			liege = { secret_religion = aztec_reformed }
		}
		AND = {
			has_flag = character_was_aztec
			liege = { secret_religion = aztec }
		}
		AND = {
			has_flag = character_was_slavic_pagan_reformed
			liege = { secret_religion = slavic_pagan_reformed }
		}
		AND = {
			has_flag = character_was_slavic_pagan
			liege = { secret_religion = slavic_pagan }
		}
		AND = {
			has_flag = character_was_west_african_pagan_reformed
			liege = { secret_religion = west_african_pagan_reformed }
		}
		AND = {
			has_flag = character_was_west_african_pagan
			liege = { secret_religion = west_african_pagan }
		}
		AND = {
			has_flag = character_was_zun_pagan_reformed
			liege = { secret_religion = zun_pagan_reformed }
		}
		AND = {
			has_flag = character_was_zun_pagan
			liege = { secret_religion = zun_pagan }
		}
		AND = {
			has_flag = character_was_hellenic_pagan_reformed
			liege = { secret_religion = hellenic_pagan_reformed }
		}
		AND = {
			has_flag = character_was_hellenic_pagan
			liege = { secret_religion = hellenic_pagan }
		}
		AND = {
			has_flag = character_was_bon_reformed
			liege = { secret_religion = bon_reformed }
		}
		AND = {
			has_flag = character_was_bon
			liege = { secret_religion = bon }
		}
		AND = {
			has_flag = character_was_zoroastrian
			liege = { secret_religion = zoroastrian }
		}
		AND = {
			has_flag = character_was_mazdaki
			liege = { secret_religion = mazdaki }
		}
		AND = {
			has_flag = character_was_zurvanist
			liege = { secret_religion = zurvanist }
		}
		AND = {
			has_flag = character_was_manichean
			liege = { secret_religion = manichean }
		}
		AND = {
			has_flag = character_was_mandaean
			liege = { secret_religion = mandaean }
		}
		AND = {
			has_flag = character_was_yazidi
			liege = { secret_religion = yazidi }
		}
		AND = {
			has_flag = character_was_khurmazta
			liege = { secret_religion = khurmazta }
		}
		AND = {
			has_flag = character_was_jewish
			liege = { secret_religion = jewish }
		}
		AND = {
			has_flag = character_was_samaritan
			liege = { secret_religion = samaritan }
		}
		AND = {
			has_flag = character_was_karaite
			liege = { secret_religion = karaite }
		}
		AND = {
			has_flag = character_was_hindu
			liege = { secret_religion = hindu }
		}
		AND = {
			has_flag = character_was_buddhist
			liege = { secret_religion = buddhist }
		}
		AND = {
			has_flag = character_was_jain
			liege = { secret_religion = jain }
		}
		AND = {
			has_flag = character_was_taoist
			liege = { secret_religion = taoist }
		}
	}
}
